macroEvents.title: 日本央行（BOJ）政策會議
macroEvents.impactHint: 日圓與利差預期改變，常透過美元指數與風險偏好影響加密市場。

result.analysis: 日本央行會議結果以官方聲明內容為主，重點觀察措辭對日圓與風險資產的影響。
result.cryptoImpact: 若日圓與美元利差預期變動，BTC/ETH 常出現短線波動放大。

macroEvents.title: FOMC 利率決議
macroEvents.impactHint: FOMC 利率與措辭常造成加密市場瞬間波動。

result.analysis: 有效聯邦基金利率較前期 -0.08%，利率偏鬆。
result.cryptoImpact: 利率回落有利風險資產估值修復。

macroEvents.title: 日本央行（BOJ）政策會議
macroEvents.impactHint: 日圓與利差預期改變，常透過美元指數與風險偏好影響加密市場。

cryptoSignals.keyChange: Bank of Korea renews call for bank-led won stablecoins as bill stalls
cryptoSignals.zhTitle: 【監管政策】Bank of Korea renews call for bank-led won stablecoins as bill stalls
cryptoSignals.zhSummary: 出現監管或政策面消息，市場通常先反映風險偏好，之後才反映中期估值；主流幣 波動可能先擴大。
cryptoSignals.cryptoImpact: 政策定價期：市場可能先震盪再選方向
cryptoSignals.cryptoAnalysis: 監管訊息通常先影響情緒與估值折價，若後續細則偏友善，主流幣有機會修復。
cryptoSignals.title: Bank of Korea renews call for bank-led won stablecoins as bill stalls
cryptoSignals.summary: The Bank of Korea proposed a bank-led consortium and a statutory interagency body for issuer approvals, citing the US GENIUS Act as a model, according to local media.

cryptoSignals.keyChange: 監管框架或執法訊號出現變化
cryptoSignals.zhTitle: 【市場情緒】監管框架或執法訊號出現變化
cryptoSignals.zhSummary: 宏觀因素正在影響加密市場，建議同步追蹤美元、利率預期與美債殖利率，主流幣 對此類消息通常較敏感。
cryptoSignals.cryptoImpact: 宏觀敏感期：BTC/ETH 對利率預期更敏感
cryptoSignals.cryptoAnalysis: 重點關注美元指數與美債殖利率，若同向走強，風險資產通常承壓。
cryptoSignals.title: Kucoin told to halt new EU business due to compliance staffing shortfalls
cryptoSignals.summary: Austria's financial regulator said Kucoin EU must appoint an anti-money-laundering officer and deputy officer, as well as a sanctions compliance officer and deputy.

cryptoSignals.title: Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin accelerates ether sales
cryptoSignals.summary: The latest sales are part of a broader plan announced in late January to fund ecosystem development and other initiative.

cryptoSignals.title: Bitdeer sold all its bitcoin to fund its move into AI data centers
cryptoSignals.summary: Singapore based BTC and AI miner sells all holdings to build liquidity for expansion, signaling a broader shift in capital strategy across the sector.

cryptoSignals.title: Tyler Winklevoss upbeat despite brutal sentiment as Gemini troubles deepen
cryptoSignals.summary: Gemini’s Tyler Winklevoss said he’s “optimistic” amid peak crypto pessimism, but SEC filings, layoffs and public data on Winklevoss Capital’s BTC sales paint a different picture.

cryptoSignals.title: ‘Investable universe’ of crypto is narrowing: NYDIG
cryptoSignals.summary: NYDIG’s Greg Cipolaro says only a handful of crypto applications are attractive to investors and that the sector needs to reevaluate its “broad ‘web3’ ambition.”

cryptoSignals.title: JPMorgan acknowledges closing Trump accounts in new court filing
cryptoSignals.summary: Court documents indicate that JPMorgan de-banked Trump, with debanking one of the main reasons the Trump family turned to crypto.

cryptoSignals.title: $61 million bitcoin whale liquidated on HTX as sentiment back at 'extreme fear'
cryptoSignals.summary: The position was the largest single forced closure in 24 hours as bitcoin shed weekend gains and the fear index returned to historic lows.

cryptoSignals.summary: Binance doubled down on its compliance credentials in a blog post after a report published earlier this month accused it of sanction violations.

cryptoSignals.title: Bitcoin ETFs bleed $3.8 billion in historic five-week outflow streak
cryptoSignals.summary: Outflows underscore persistent institutional wariness toward bitcoin after the early October crash.

cryptoSignals.title: Bitcoin ETFs’ 5-week bleed, Metaplanet rejects accusations: Hodlers Digest, Feb. 15 – 22
cryptoSignals.summary: US-based spot Bitcoin ETFs have shed around $2.6 billion already in 2026; Bitcoin developer Matt Corallo shuts down quantum as the reason for the recent sell-off; and other news.

cryptoSignals.keyChange: Iran’s rial collapse mirrors Lebanon’s crisis, driving citizens to bitcoin
cryptoSignals.zhTitle: 【市場情緒】Iran’s rial collapse mirrors Lebanon’s crisis, driving citizens to bitcoin
cryptoSignals.zhSummary: 市場訊息更新中，建議配合成交量、波動率與資金費率判讀，避免在雜訊行情中過度交易。
cryptoSignals.cryptoImpact: 市場事件影響中
cryptoSignals.cryptoAnalysis: 建議搭配波動率、成交量與資金費率做確認，再決定進出場節奏。
cryptoSignals.title: Iran’s rial collapse mirrors Lebanon’s crisis, driving citizens to bitcoin
cryptoSignals.summary: With the rial plunging, middle-class savers are bypassing local banks to move billions into the domestic crypto ecosystem.

cryptoSignals.keyChange: 關稅政策變動（幅度 15%）
cryptoSignals.zhTitle: 【宏觀變數】關稅政策變動（幅度 15%）
cryptoSignals.zhSummary: 宏觀因素正在影響加密市場，建議同步追蹤美元、利率預期與美債殖利率，BTC 對此類消息通常較敏感。
cryptoSignals.cryptoImpact: 宏觀敏感期：BTC/ETH 對利率預期更敏感
cryptoSignals.cryptoAnalysis: 重點關注美元指數與美債殖利率，若同向走強，風險資產通常承壓。
cryptoSignals.title: Bitcoin price slips after Trump hikes worldwide tariff to 15% from 10% despite Supreme Court decision
cryptoSignals.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump announced a 15% worldwide tariff on imported goods, despite an earlier Supreme Court decision that invalidated earlier trade actions.

cryptoSignals.keyChange: 安全事件風險上升
cryptoSignals.zhTitle: 【資安風險】安全事件風險上升
cryptoSignals.zhSummary: 出現風險事件（如爆倉/資安/大戶行為）訊號，主流幣 容易產生連鎖波動，宜優先控管風險。
cryptoSignals.cryptoImpact: 中短線風險升高：波動率可能擴大
cryptoSignals.cryptoAnalysis: 建議降低槓桿與倉位集中度，優先確認市場流動性與主要交易所未平倉量變化。
cryptoSignals.title: How AI is helping retail traders exploit prediction market 'glitches' to make easy money
cryptoSignals.summary: A fully automated bot quietly captured micro-arbitrage opportunities on short-term crypto prediction markets, netting nearly $150,000
